data.title: Convert Portrait Video to Landscape Online
data.meta_description: Convert a portrait video to landscape online easily. Turn your MP4 online with the help of Typito. Change a horizontal video to vertical.
data.text:
Simply upload your video on Typito and get started. Typito offers an effortless way to rotate your favorite videos in just a click. You can convert horizontal videos to landscape or vice versa.

You can rotate a video from portrait to landscape for free on Typito. Simply upload your video and click the Rotate option. You can rotate videos 90Â° or custom rotate videos to the desired angle.

You can change the orientation of a video from portrait to landscape for free on Typito. Simply upload your video and click the Resize option to resize your video from a portrait orientation to landscape or vice versa.

You can change the orientation of a video from horizontal to vertical for free on Typito. Simply upload your video and click the Resize option to resize your video from a horizontal orientation to landscape. You can then zoom in or out to ensure you havenât lost your video details.

You can use Typitoâs online tool to rotate your video and export it as an HD MP4 video. This ensures your video will not lose quality and is compatible with all YouTube, Facebook, and other major platforms.

Absolutely! When you rotate some videos, you may see black bars on the sides after rotating. You can remove the black bars by cropping the video with the help of Typito. Click the video on the canvas and then use the crop video tool to adjust your frame accordingly. Once youâve adjusted your video to resize the dimensions and remove the bars automatically, you can edit your project as needed to add text, music, and more.
